sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; export default function ProductDetails() { const [singleProduct, setSingleProduct] = useState(null); const {id} = useParams(); useEffect(() => { fetch(process.env.REACT_APP_PRODUCT_API_URL + "product/" + id) .then((data) => data.json()) .then((data) => setSingleProduct(data.products)); }, [singleProduct]); return ( singleProduct && (
